name: Ambulance Chaser
description:
Meet Sal Greatguy, the very definition of a scummy perfectly honest lawyer, as he tries to make a quick buck... by taking the title slightly too literally.

This game was made in a month for Game Off 2022, based on the theme "Cliché".

WASD/ARROWS: movement

SPACEBAR: jump

The webGL version has sound/performance issues on some browsers - if you run into any of these, please try the Windows version!

3D art: Rambo_One2

SFX, music, sound programming: m3t4lp0w3r

Programming, game design: Ste-Gar

Thanks for playing!
